segments.text: I notice the quietness of the kitchen, a stark contrast to the activity happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The running water is such a glaring issue, and it frustrates me that the woman doesn't see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The more I observe, the more I feel a sense of impending chaos looming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children’s antics make me chuckle, though; their little scheme is both brave and reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Especially the boy, reaching for those cookies with sheer determination; it’s almost heroic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him, so expectant, adds an element of sweet innocence to their heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: As the water continues to flow, I find myself hoping they don’t get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
